reviewText:
Nothing more needed to say, its the Trailer Park Boys!
If you like silly humor, and you don't mind a lot of fowl language, then this is your thing.
I love the Trailer Park Boys! Go Bubbles!
If you're a rabid TPB fan you've got to have this in your collection! Hilarious!! And share this with your friends--they'll be hooked on TPB as well. A legal addiction!!
I think this is one of the funniest shows ever. The Deluxe 2 Disc Set has everything on it. It's second only to the Special Christmas Edition.
Season 7 offers up some of the best yet from the TPB!  Anyone who has enjoyed the previous seasons will have to add this DVD set to their collection; they will not be dissapointed!!
